member.name: IItemNameLimits.GetMaxLength
member.summary: Returns the maximum number of characters allowed for a particular name in the namespace under which it is called.
member.param: A pointer to a string containing a name.
A pointer to the maximum number of characters which can be used in the name.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IItemNameLimits.GetValidCharacters
member.summary: Loads a string that contains each of the characters that are valid or invalid in the namespace under which it is called.
member.param: A pointer to a string that contains all valid characters in the namespace. If the namespace provides any invalid characters in ppwszInvalidChars, then this value returns NULL. See Remarks for more details.
A pointer to a string that contains all invalid characters in the namespace.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IItemNameLimits
member.summary: Retrieves a list of valid and invalid characters or the maximum length of a name in the namespace. Use this interface for validation parsing and translation.
